languages.text: "Быть может. Или же от одного моего присутствия создания вроде вас забывают, как дышать?" {n}Тазарра издает ядовитый смешок.{/n} "Стоит ли удивляться тому, что случилось? Вы сами соорудили силок под своими ногами — мы лишь выбили колышек, который привел его в действие. Пара залпов по запорам подземных колодцев — и сама планета, которую вы вывернули наизнанку, забрала свое".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может. Или же от одного моего присутствия создания вроде вас забывают, как дышать?" {n}Тазарра издает ядовитый смешок.{/n} "Стоит ли удивляться тому, что случилось? Вы сами соорудили силок под своими ногами — мы лишь выбили колышек, который привел ее в действие. Пара залпов по запорам подземных колодцев — и сама планета, которую вы вывернули наизнанку, забрала свое".

languages.text: "It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."
languages.original_text: "Быть может. Или же от одного моего присутствия создания вроде вас забывают, как дышать?" {n}Тазарра издает ядовитый смешок.{/n} "Стоит ли удивляться тому, что случилось? Вы сами соорудили силок под своими ногами — мы лишь выбили колышек, который привел его в действие. Пара залпов по запорам подземных колодцев — и сама планета, которую вы вывернули наизнанку, забрала свое".

traits.locale_text: "It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make the base creatures like yourself forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra gives a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Why even be surprised at what happened? You built a trap under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that made it snap. A couple of volleys at the underground well covers, and the planet you had turned inside out did the rest."

"It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make the base creatures like yourself forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra gives a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Why even be surprised at what happened? You built a trap under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that made it snap. A couple of volleys at the underground well covers, and the planet you had turned inside out did the rest."

"It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra gives a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that snapped it shut. A couple of volleys at the underground well seals, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

"It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra gives a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that snapped it shut. A couple of volleys at the underground well seals, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

"It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

"It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

languages.text: 「そうかもしれない。もしくは、私がいるだけで貴様らのような下等生物は、息をするのも忘れてしまのでは？」{n}タザーラはこちらを煽るようにクスクス笑う。{/n}「この事態に本当に驚いていると？貴様らは自らの足元に網を張り巡らせた…こちらはその網を締め付ける支柱を倒しただけに過ぎない。そしてその網は貴様らを囲い込んだだけだよ。地下井戸の封印に何回か一斉攻撃をしたら、あとはそちらが引っ掻き回した惑星が勝手にやってくれたのさ」
languages.original_text: "It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

traits.locale_text: 「そうかもしれない。もしくは、私がいるだけで貴様らのような下等生物は、息をするのも忘れてしまのでは？」{n}タザーラはこちらを煽るようにクスクス笑う。{/n}「この事態に本当に驚いていると？貴様らは自らの足元に網を張り巡らせた…こちらはその網を締め付ける支柱を倒しただけに過ぎない。そしてその網は貴様らを囲い込んだだけだよ。地下井戸の封印に何回か一斉攻撃をしたら、あとはそちらが引っ掻き回した惑星が勝手にやってくれたのさ」

languages.text: “或许是我干的，又或许我仅仅是露了个面，就让你们这种劣等生物忘记了该如何呼吸，你说呢？”{n}塔扎菈以令人厌恶的语气咯咯笑了起来。{/n}“此时此刻发生的事情，真的让你很惊讶吗？是你自己把罗网缠在了自己脚上，我们仅仅是把它的钉子拔掉而已。我们不过是对着地下井的封条开了几枪，至于接下来的事情，都是这颗被挖了个底朝天的行星自己做的。”
languages.original_text: "It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

traits.locale_text: “或许是我干的，又或许我仅仅是露了个面，就让你们这种劣等生物忘记了该如何呼吸，你说呢？”{n}塔扎菈以令人厌恶的语气咯咯笑了起来。{/n}“此时此刻发生的事情，真的让你很惊讶吗？是你自己把罗网缠在了自己脚上，我们仅仅是把它的钉子拔掉而已。我们不过是对着地下井的封条开了机枪，至于接下来的事情，都是这颗被挖了个底朝天的行星自己做的。”

languages.text: « Peut-être. Ou peut-être que ma simple présence suffit à faire oublier à des créatures aussi primitives que vous comment respirer. » {n}Tazarra éclate d'un rire méprisant.{/n} « Êtes-vous réellement {mf|surpris|surprise} de ce qui s'est passé ? Vous avez tendu le filet sous vos propres pieds. Tout ce que nous avons eu à faire, c'est en libérer les attaches pour qu'il se referme sur vous. Quelques salves ont suffi à détruire les sceaux du puits souterrain, et cette même planète sur laquelle vous aviez de toute façon déjà semé le chaos s'est chargée du reste. »
languages.original_text: "It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être. Ou peut-être que ma simple présence suffit à faire oublier à des créatures aussi primitives que vous comment respirer. » {n}Tazarra éclate d'un rire méprisant.{/n} « Êtes-vous réellement {mf|surpris|surprise} de ce qui s'est passé ? Vous avez tendu le filet sous vos propres pieds. Tout ce que nous avons eu à faire, c'est en libérer les attaches pour qu'il se referme sur vous. Quelques salves ont suffi à détruire les sceaux du puits souterrain, et cette même planète sur laquelle vous aviez de toute façon déjà semé le chaos s'est chargée du reste. »

languages.text: «Es posible. O a lo mejor mi mera presencia basta para que seres tan rastreros como tú olvidéis respirar». {n}Tazarra suelta una risa desagradable.{/n} «¿De verdad te sorprende lo que ha pasado? Habéis puesto la red bajo vuestros propios pies, nosotros solo hemos hecho saltar la trampa que la cerraba a vuestro alrededor. Un par de salvas contra los sellos del pozo subterráneo y el mismo planeta que habíais puesto patas arriba se ocupó del resto».
languages.original_text: "It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

traits.locale_text: «Es posible. O a lo mejor mi mera presencia basta para que seres tan rastreros como tú olvidéis respirar». {n}Tazarra suelta una risa desagradable.{/n} «¿De verdad te sorprende lo que ha pasado? Habéis puesto la red bajo vuestros propios pies, nosotros solo hemos hecho saltar la trampa que la cerraba a vuestro alrededor. Un par de salvas contra los sellos del pozo subterráneo y el mismo planeta que habíais puesto patas arriba se ocupó del resto».

languages.text: "Mag sein. Oder vielleicht reicht meine bloße Anwesenheit schon aus, damit niedere Kreaturen wie Ihr das Atmen verlernen?" {n}Tazarra lacht bösartig auf.{/n} "Seid Ihr wirklich überrascht? Ihr habt das Netz direkt unter Euren eigenen Füßen gewebt. Wir haben lediglich den Pflock umgeworfen, durch den es sich eng um Euch zusammengezogen hat. Ein paar Salven gegen die Siegel des unterirdischen Brunnens und der Planet, den Ihr von innen nach außen gekehrt hattet, hat den Rest erledigt."
languages.original_text: "It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

traits.locale_text: "Mag sein. Oder vielleicht reicht meine bloße Anwesenheit schon aus, damit niedere Kreaturen wie Ihr das Atmen verlernen?" {n}Tazarra lacht bösartig auf.{/n} "Seid Ihr wirklich überrascht? Ihr habt das Netz direkt unter Euren eigenen Füßen gewebt. Wir haben lediglich den Pflock umgeworfen, durch den es sich eng um Euch zusammengezogen hat. Ein paar Salven gegen die Siegel des unterirdischen Brunnens und der Planet, den Ihr von innen nach außen gekehrt hattet, hat den Rest erledigt."

languages.text: "Olabilir. Belki de senin gibi sıradan yaratıklar, varlığım karşısında nasıl nefes alınacağını unutuyorlardır." {n}Tazarra, samimiyetsiz bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Bu olanlara gerçekten şaşırıyor musun? Kendi kazdığın kuyuya düştün. Bizse seni buraya yönlendirmekten başka bir şey yapmadık. Yer altındaki kuyunun mühürlerine birkaç el ateş ettik. Altını üstüne getirdiğin bu gezegen, gerisini bizim için halletti."
languages.original_text: "It could be. Or perhaps my mere presence is enough to make base creatures like yourselves forget how to breathe?" {n}Tazarra lets out a nasty chuckle.{/n} "Are you really surprised at what happened? You wove the net right under your own feet — we merely knocked out the pin that drew it closed tight around you. A couple of volleys at the seals on the underground well, and the planet, the one you had turned inside out, did the rest."

traits.locale_text: "Olabilir. Belki de senin gibi sıradan yaratıklar, varlığım karşısında nasıl nefes alınacağını unutuyorlardır." {n}Tazarra, samimiyetsiz bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Bu olanlara gerçekten şaşırıyor musun? Kendi kazdığın kuyuya düştün. Bizse seni buraya yönlendirmekten başka bir şey yapmadık. Yer altındaki kuyunun mühürlerine birkaç el ateş ettik. Altını üstüne getirdiğin bu gezegen, gerisini bizim için halletti."
